q: How much usage is included with the Appflowy AI add-on plan?
a: When you purchase the Notion AI add-on, you’re enabling everyone in your workspace (except for guests) to have unlimited use of Notion AI. To ensure optimal performance and fair usage across all Notion AI users, your access to AI features can be reduced depending on your usage.

q: Is there a free trial for Appflowy AI?
a: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for Appflowy AI. You can cancel at any time during your trial and you won't be charged. Read more about our free trial here.

q: Who is eligible for the 20% discount for annual billing?
a: The 20% discount for annual billing is available to all Notion AI users who are on the Team plan or above. The discount is applied to the total cost of the plan, not per user.

q: How does Appflowy AI use my data?
a: We use your data to provide you with the best experience possible. This includes using your data to train our models and improve our services, as well as personalizing your experience.

q: How do I get charged when I add members to my workspace?
a: When you add a member to your workspace, you’ll be charged a prorated amount for the remainder of the billing cycle. For example, if you add a member to your workspace on the 15th day of a monthly billing cycle, you’ll be charged 50% of the monthly cost for that member.

q: Can I purchase Appflowy AI for only part of my team?
a: No, Appflowy AI is available for your entire workspace. You can’t purchase Appflowy AI for only part of your team.
